test.name: To check the help message using --help command

kw.name: File Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails unless the given ``path`` points to an existing file.

kw.name: Run
kw.msg:
${result} = usage: uservalidation.py [-h] [-u USERNAME] [-p PASSWORD] [-a AGE]
User validation
options: -h, --help show this help message and exit -u USERNAME, --username USERNAME ...
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: show this help message and exit
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
